comment: Sweet, disciplined, and hardworking girl. Your quest for extra dessert in the mess is hilarious!  Frm gossip to campus walks and enjoying kettle Maggi together,  had so much fun times. Sticker spammer. True sportsperson (voh badminton strategies sikhayi nhi tu😂), Will always cherish our memories!❤️
name: Kanchi Pardhi

comment: Very smart, trustworthy, studious girl and will fight for every markx`x`😂. She is sporty and is ready to try every new sport. Always ready to help be it notes, doubts (even attendance😅😅). I am waiting to see your all Apple products collection soon(@ sky rocking stock prices)😎😎. Let's keep in touch. Wishing you all the best!
name: Nishit

comment: Dedicated girl who both, excels in academics and beats the hell out of opponents in sports. It's been a joy to watching you achieve in life and Kanchi being your inseparable dynamic duo! Your simplicity and kindness are truly admirable in this friendship. Wishing you the best for your future, Neha.
name: Nilay Ganvit

comment: Neha you are perfect example of we can ace anything once we start. Enjoyed every bit of our conversations and time together.✨
name: Aditi Mishra

comment:
A very well balanced person, who made my meals interesting whenever we sat together. All rounder. Do text me when (if?) you'll be coming to Pune for work.
P.S. I hope you do find your calculator someday XD.

comment: Lazy toh nhi ho aap, srsly a dedicated person, who is so academically good, and literally approachable....and thanks for the project wala thing😂. Stay connected and all the really best

comment: One of the most accomplished girls in CSE, she is very hardworking. You can always spot her with Kanchi, so much, that Neha and Kanchi have become almost synonymous now. One last thing: sorry for giving all those vivas just before you😂😂
name: Mukul Jain

comment: Choosing the ML course was an excellent choice since I actually got to know you more. You are a great friend. Would have known this earlier if we interacted during our intern lol.

comment: One of the most sweetest n dedicated ones among ones I've known.Those GC bdmntn talks😂,practice at sports complex,hostel,I always loved the Kanchi-Neha duo,our talks during the first Sarafa visit to talks outside DA skipping dinner😂Your dedication n simpliness will always bring you success. ATB!

comment: Calm, polite, kind, and intelligent person. I will need more of the Haryanvi learning sessions😂. All the best!

comment: One of the most admirable girls I've met here. It's fun to talk with you. At first, I thought it would be difficult to approach you, but when we first visited Heydeli, our conversation flowed so naturally—wishing you all the best for your future. Let's stay in touch.
name: Aayushi Choubey

comment: You are the definition of simple and disciplined. vo online project meets me mera reminder banne ke liye thanks yr😂 tumhare bina vo shyd complete hi na hote. Always be the way you are- sweet and simple.(bas thoda discipline kam kr dena mann ho to😂)
name: Khushi Verma

comment: Dedicated, disciplined and sweet girl. Wouldn't have survived online sems without you😂. Always be as you are and have that smile on your face. Milte julte rehna kahi bhi raho!
name: Sanskar Verma

comment: You're the most hard-working and intelligent girl! 🌟 With college behind you, no more fretting about exam marks😊 Let's dive deeper into Haryanvi! 💬 We'll definitely meet in Pune 🎉 And don't forget to visit my home too! 🏡

comment: Such a disciplined and kind person. Had a great time to be your roomie. I really learn a lot from you. Milte julte rehna❤️

comment: You are one of the first few people I spoke to on campus. Thank you for being my study partner in the first year that helped me alot in reducing exam anxiety levels. You were always there be it 2am or 3am . you are simple and inspiring in the way u think. All the best for future!!

comment: Those online btp meets every sunday ruined the weekend but ranting together about the work sure made it better😂.  Keep in touch and all the best for your future❤️

comment: Had so much fun as flatmates🤩 and doing btp meets together.😇 All the best for future and stay connected.💗

comment: From our countless online semester chats to your wonderful Haryanvi accent, getting to know you has been an absolute pleasure. comment: You are an amazing friend and an introvert. The one who is focused that nothing else near matters. Pro badminton player who loves to enjoy whatever she does.
